metadata.title: CVE-2020-15665 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Firefox did not reset the address bar after the beforeunload dialog wasshown if the user chose to remain on the page. This could have resulted inan incorrect URL being shown when used in conjunction with other unexpectedbrowser behaviors. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 80.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
